headline: Portugal Colocation Data Center Portfolio Analysis Report: Start Campus, Portugal Telecom (Altice) and Equinix Rank Among the Leading Data Center Operators by Capacity
summary: Discover in-depth insights into the booming Portugal data center market with our comprehensive Excel database. Analyze 12 existing and 9 upcoming colocation data centers in key locations like Lisbon, Covilhã, and Madeira. Access detailed metrics on current and future white-floor space, IT load capacities, and colocation pricing. Key operators like Start Campus and Portugal Telecom lead this vibrant market. Ideal for data center REITs, construction contractors, and infrastructure providers. Stay
